name: Rabid Rodents
text: Hunter Mode Only. Vermin and Vermine (Clone) gets +1 ATK. Forced Response: After a RAT minion enters play, place 1 threat on it.

name: Sting of the Scorpion
text: Hunter Mode Only. Forced Response: After the villain phase ends, the first player chooses: • Place 1 wound counter on J. Jonah Jameson. • Discard cards from the encounter deck until an attachment is discarded. Reveal that card.

name: Cold-Blooded
text: Hunter Mode Only. The target threat value of the main scheme is reduced by 1[per_hero] . Forced Response: After Curtis Connors activates against your hero, deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card.

name: Aerial Excellence
text: Hunter Mode Only. Forced Response: After step one of the villain phase, place 1 threat on the main scheme for each identity without the AERIAL trait. Each identity with the AERIAL trait takes 2 indirect damage.

name: Master Trapper
text: Hunter Mode Only. Forced Response: After step one of the villain phase, deal each player 1 facedown TRAP card. Forced Interrupt: When the TRAP discard pile is shuffled back into the TRAP deck, deal the first player 1 facedown encounter card.

flavor: "What in the unholy #%$@ is going on here? Fellow furry fellas are freaking out for no reason!"
name: Rocket Raccon
text:
Experience Cost 4.
[star] Rocket Raccoon's basic attack gains ranged, piercing and overkill.

errata: Replace [X-man] traits with [X-Men] as official allies are (Merlin).
flavor: "I will hunt down the culprit, and make them pay."
name: Old Man Logan
text:
Experience Cost 4.
Interrupt: When Old Man Logan defends against an attack, deal damage to the attacker equal to Old Man Logan's ATK.

flavor: "I'll fight for you... for the right price, of course."
name: Black Cat
text: Experience Cost 4. [star] Forced Response: After Black Cat thwarts, discard the top card of your deck. If that card has a printed [mental] resource, add it to your hand.

flavor: "No fiend can hide from the lord of the jungle!"
name: Ka-Zar
text: Experience Cost 4. Response: After Ka-Zar enters play, deal damage to the villain equal to the villain's stage number.

flavor: "If even the Vulture is willing to work with you, then count me in."
name: Gibbon
text: Experience Cost 1. Interrupt: When Gibbon would take any amount of damage, prevent 1 of that damage. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Evade
text: Experience Cost 2. Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage from an attack, prevent 3 of that damage. If you took no damage from this attack, draw 1 card.

name: Taunt
text: Experience Cost 1. Hero Action: Give the villain up to three facedown boost cards. Draw 1 card for each facedown boost card given to the villain this way.

name: Stead Fast
text: Experience Cost 3. Hero Interrupt: When you reveal an encounter card, spend a [physical] resource → cancel that encounter card's "When Revealed" effects.

name: Finish Them Off
text: Experience Cost 2. Hero Action (attack): Deal 2 damage to an enemy. If that enemy was defeated this way, draw 2 cards.

name: fresh Tracks
text: Experience Cost 2. Interrupt: When you thwart, increase the amount of threat that thwart removes by 2. If this thwart removes the last threat from a scheme, deal 1 damage to an enemy and draw 1 card.

name: Savage Land
text: Experience Cost 4. Hero Action: Exhaust Savage Land and deal 1 damage to a hero or ally → that character gets +1 THW and +1 ATK until the end of the round.

name: Hunting Rifle
text: Experience Cost 2. Restricted. Uses (3 ammo counters). Hero Action (attack): Exhaust Hunting Rifle and remove 1 ammo counter from it → deal 2 damage to an enemy. This attack gains ranged.

name: Hatchet
text: Experience Cost 2. Restricted. Interrupt: When you make a basic attack exhaust Hatchet → you get +1 ATK for that attack.

name: Hunterbot
text: Experience Cost 3. Max 1 per player. Your hero gets +1 ATK. Forced Interrupt: When you would take any amount of damage, place it here instead. Then, if there is 3 or more damage here, discard Hunterbot.

name: Trap
text: Experience Cost 1. Interrupt: When an enemy attacks you, discard Trap → deal 2 damage to that enemy. If that enemy was defeated this way, return Trap to your hand.

name: In Hiding
text: Experience Cost 2. Hero Interrupt: When an enemy would attack you, discard In Hiding → that enemy schemes instead, without getting a boost card for this activation.

name: Vermin
text: Vermin enters play with 3 rat counters.\nForced Interrupt: When Vermin would take any amount of damage, remove 1 rat counter from him instead.

name: Lizard
text: Quickstrike. Retaliate 1. Forced Interrupt: When Lizard attacks, the attack gains piercing.

flavor: "Vermin is tired of being alone. Vermin wants friends."
name: Vermin
text: Vermin enters play with 3 rat counters.\n[star] Interrupt: When Vermin attack, remove 1 rat counter from him \u2192 Vermin does not take consequential damage from this attack.

flavor: "Time to deliver this evildoer to the police! (Or something.)"
name: Scorpion
text: [star] Response: After Scorpion attacks and damages an enemy, deal 1 damage to Scorpion → stun that enemy and deal 1 damage to it.

flavor: "I have been given a second chance. I never deserved it. But I will use it."
name: Lizard
text:
[star] While you are in alter ego form, Lizard gets +3 THW.
[star] While you are in hero form, Lizard gets +3 ATK.

flavor: "No one hates the heroes more than i do, but they are not our enemies right now."
name: Vulture
text: Action: Exhaust Vulture and deal 1 damage to him → ready a friendly character. That character gains the AERIAL trait until the end of the phase.

flavor: Kraven has sent his many sons out into the world to prove themselves worthy by hunting valuable prey
name: Son of Kraven
text: Quickstrike.

name: Captured!
text: You cannot change form. Action: Exhaust your identity → discard Captured!

flavor: Your enemies have caught your scent. Shake them off your trail!
name: Hunted!
text: Each minion engaged with you gains quickstrike. Alter-Ego Action: Discard a card from your hand → discard Hunted!

name: Poisoned!
text: When Revealed: Choose to either spend a [energy] resource or take 2 damage.
